elements.text: It's Friday night, and you decide to go to see a movie. During the movie, you have a lot on your mind, so you have trouble following the plot. You close your eyes and listen to the dialogue, and soon you are back on...

elements.name: Movie Distraction_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
